channel.title: Is this a good VPS?
channel.description:
Hi. I'm planning on buying a VPS soon and I'm wondering if someone could confirm the quality of this:
[ul][li]1024MB RAM[/li] [li]2048MB Burst[/li] [li]75 GB RAID10 Diskspace[/li] [li]2000GB Bandwidth[/li] [li]100Mbit Port[/li] [li]1 IPv4 Address[/li] [li]OpenVZ/SolusVM[/li] [li]$7/Month[/li][/ul]
I plan to host a SA:MP server and a website on it. Is this good?

item.title: Is this a good VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

What about this:

[ul][li]2048MB RAM[/li]
[li]4096MB Burst[/li]
[li]4 CPU Cores[/li]
[li]200GB Diskspace[/li]
[li]2000GB Bandwidth[/li]
[li]100Mbps Port[/li]
[li]1 IPv4 Address[/li]
[li]OpenVZ/SolusVM[/li]
[li]$7/Month | Order[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good VPS?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You could get 4gb for a bit more, and I do not recommend SolusVM. I’ve used it before, and it’s quite a lot of hassle. If I may ask, where did you buy this VPS from?

Read full topic
